about.title: Connecting People
about.description: CrowdSolve is a platform designed to connect people who seek to solve problems collaboratively. Its aim is to bring together different types of users, such as experts, companies, and participants interested in finding innovative solutions to specific challenges.
about.mission_description: CrowdSolve aims to foster open collaboration, where ideas and solutions are shared and evaluated, allowing problems to be solved efficiently. Additionally, it focuses on creating a space where users can showcase their skills, work together, and contribute value at both an individual and organizational level.
about.vision_description: CrowdSolve's vision is to be the global leader in collaborative problem-solving, where collective intelligence and creativity transform challenges into innovative solutions. We aim to create an inclusive and gamified ecosystem that connects businesses, experts, and creatives from around the world to drive progress and innovation.
about.section_title: Facilitating the Creation of Innovative Solutions
about.section_description: Our goal is to empower teams and individuals to collaborate and find innovative solutions to specific challenges. Here’s how we plan to achieve it.

features.title: Fostering Open Collaboration
features.description: We believe there's no room for big egos, and there's always time to help each other. We strive to give and receive feedback, ideas, and perspectives.

features.title: Moving Forward with Clarity
features.description: Boldly, bravely, and with clear goals. We look for big opportunities and focus on the most important things to work on.

features.title: Optimizing for Empowerment
features.description: We believe everyone should be empowered to do what they think is best for the company's interests.

features.title: Gamification for Participation
features.description: We incorporate points, badges, and rankings to incentivize active participation, rewarding effort and creativity within the community.

features.title: Real-Time Collaboration
features.description: We offer online collaboration tools that facilitate interaction, idea exchange, and proposal review, promoting efficient and enriching teamwork.

features.title: Driving Global Innovation
features.description: We connect a diverse network of global participants, enabling the most innovative ideas to emerge from different perspectives and experiences.

challengesPost.sectionDescription: Participate in challenges posted by various companies and showcase your skills. Great opportunities await you!

CrowdSourcingEasy.sectionDescription: CrowdSolve streamlines the crowdsourcing process into three key phases: challenge posting, community participation, and collaborative evaluation.

publishChallenges.title: Post Challenges
publishChallenges.description: Describe your problem and invite the CrowdSolve community to offer innovative solutions.

engageCommunity.title: Engage the Community
engageCommunity.description: Access a global network of problem solvers and collaborate on the best solutions.

evaluateCollaboratively.title: Evaluate Collaboratively
evaluateCollaboratively.description: Review proposed solutions and select the most promising ones through a collaborative process.

faqs.question: What is CrowdSolve?
faqs.answer: CrowdSolve is a collaborative platform where users can work together to solve complex problems.

faqs.question: How does CrowdSolve work?
faqs.answer: CrowdSolve allows users to post problems and collaborate with others to find solutions through collective intelligence.

faqs.question: Who can use CrowdSolve?
faqs.answer: Anyone interested in solving problems can join CrowdSolve. No specific skills are required, just a desire to collaborate and contribute.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: The benefits of using CrowdSolve include access to a diverse community of problem solvers, the opportunity to find innovative solutions, and the chance to learn from others.

Herosection.title: Unlock Creative Solutions with CrowdSolve
Herosection.description: CrowdSolve is a powerful crowdsourcing platform that connects businesses with a global community to solve complex challenges. Post your challenge, engage the crowd, and collaborate on innovative solutions.

innovation.title: Innovation Without Limits
innovation.subtitle: Unleash the Creative Power of the Crowd

footer.description: Connecting brilliant minds with innovative business challenges.

RegistroEmpresaEntry.welcomeDescription: A few key things you should know before creating your company account:
RegistroEmpresaEntry.moderationTitle: We moderate all challenges before publishing.
RegistroEmpresaEntry.moderationDescription: Our editorial team manually reviews each challenge and may make changes in your challenge inbox before approving publication.
RegistroEmpresaEntry.verificationTitle: Your company will be verified before account activation.
RegistroEmpresaEntry.verificationDescription: After creating the account, we will verify the authenticity of the information provided about your company. This process is necessary to ensure the validity of the data.

header.title: Boost your innovation with CrowdSolve.
header.description: Connect with leading companies, solve exciting challenges, and be part of the crowdsourcing revolution.

contact.title: You can find us on our social networks and contact us
contact.description: If you have any questions, comments, or need more information about our challenges, feel free to contact us. Your opinion is important, and we are committed to providing the support you need. Complete the form below or use any of our contact channels to reach out to us. We look forward to hearing from you soon!

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At CrowdSolve, we value and respect your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our platform and services.

list.infoCollect1: Registration information: name, email address, password.
list.infoCollect2: Profile information: professional experience, skills, profile picture (optional).
list.infoCollect4: Usage information: interactions with the platform, participation in challenges.
list.infoCollect5: Payment information: to process rewards (only for winning participants).

list.infoUsage2: Facilitate participation in challenges and collaboration between users.
list.infoUsage4: Send notifications related to the service and updates.
list.infoUsage5: Prevent fraud and ensure platform security.

informationSharing.title: 3. Sharing Information
informationSharing.description: We share your information in the following circumstances:

list.infoSharing1: With companies posting challenges, limited to the information necessary to evaluate proposals.
list.infoSharing2: With service providers that help us operate the platform.
list.infoSharing3: When required by law or to protect our legal rights.

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration. However, no data transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

list.uRights3: Request the deletion of your data.
list.uRights4: Object to the processing of your data.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance user experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings.

policyChanges.title: 7. Changes to the Privacy Policy
policyChanges.description: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes via a notice on our platform or by email.

contact.description: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

Termsofservice.title: Terms of Service
Termsofservice.intro: Welcome to CrowdSolve! Before accessing our services, please read these Terms of Service.
Termsofservice.overview: These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of CrowdSolve, including our web platform, collaboration tools, and all associated services (together, our 'Services'). These Terms are a contract between you and CrowdSolve. By accessing our Services, you agree to these Terms.
Termsofservice.readPlsDesc: , which describes how we collect and use personal information.

sections.title: 1. Use of Our Services
sections.content: Our Services are designed to connect companies with a global community of solvers. You must follow all policies made available within the Services. You can only use our Services as permitted by law. We may suspend or stop providing you with our Services if you do not comply with our terms or policies or if we are investigating suspected misconduct.

sections.title: 2. Your Account
sections.content: You need an account to use CrowdSolve. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for any activity that occurs through it. Keep your password secure and contact us immediately if you detect any unauthorized use of your account. Your account may be for a company posting challenges or for a participant submitting solutions.

sections.title: 3. Posting Challenges and Participation
sections.content: Companies can post challenges on our platform. By doing so, you agree to provide accurate information about the requirements, deadlines, and rewards. Participants can submit proposals for these challenges. By participating, you guarantee that your proposal is original and does not infringe on third-party rights.

sections.title: 4. Intellectual Property
sections.content: The intellectual property rights of winning proposals will be transferred to the company that posted the challenge, according to the specific terms of each challenge. CrowdSolve does not claim ownership of non-winning proposals. We respect intellectual property rights and expect all users to do the same.

sections.title: 5. Payments and Rewards
sections.content: Companies are responsible for providing the promised rewards to the winners of the challenges. CrowdSolve facilitates the payment process but is not responsible for defaults by the companies. Participants are responsible for any applicable taxes on the rewards received.

sections.title: 6. Privacy and Data Protection
sections.content: Our privacy policy explains how we handle your personal data and protect your privacy when using our Services. By using CrowdSolve, you agree that we may use your data in accordance with our privacy policy. We are committed to protecting the confidentiality of sensitive information shared in the challenges.

sections.title: 7. Modifications to the Terms
sections.content: We may modify these Terms from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes to the Terms. Your continued use of our Services after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.

Termsofservice.byUsing: By using CrowdSolve, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our Services. If you have any questions about these Terms, contact us at

contact.text: If you have any questions about these Terms, contact us at

UsagePolicy.title: Acceptable Use Policy
UsagePolicy.accpUP: This Acceptable Use Policy (AUP) describes prohibited practices when using CrowdSolve. By using our platform, you agree to comply with this AUP. CrowdSolve reserves the right to modify this policy at any time.

content.gC3: Be honest and transparent in all interactions.
content.gC4: Maintain confidentiality of sensitive information shared in challenges.
content.gC5: Treat other users with respect and professionalism.

content.pAc1: Post illegal, defamatory, harassing, obscene, or fraudulent content.
content.pAc2: Infringe on the intellectual property rights of others.
content.pAc3: Use the platform to distribute spam or malware.
content.pAc4: Attempt to access other users' accounts or systems without authorization.
content.pAc5: Manipulate the platform's voting or evaluation systems.
content.pAc6: Create multiple accounts to bypass rules or gain an unfair advantage.
content.pAc7: Disclose confidential information of other users or companies without authorization.

content.chC1: Provide accurate and clear information about the challenge requirements.
content.chC2: Set fair terms for the transfer of intellectual property.
content.chC3: Fulfill promises regarding rewards and deadlines.
content.chC4: Do not request solutions for illegal or unethical activities.

content.pASol: Submit only original work or have the necessary rights for the content submitted.
content.pASo2: Respect the confidentiality of information provided in challenges.
content.pASo3: Do not copy or plagiarize other participants' work.
content.pASo4: Provide accurate information about your skills and experience.

content.pU1: Do not attempt to interfere with the proper functioning of the platform.
content.pU2: Do not use bots, scrapers, or other automated means to access CrowdSolve.
content.pU3: Do not collect information from other users without their consent.
content.pU4: Do not sell or transfer your account to third parties.

nonComplianceConsequences.header2: Violation of this AUP may result in:

content.nonCC2: Suspension or termination of the user's account.
content.nonCC3: Disqualification from current or future challenges.
content.nonCC4: Legal actions in cases of serious violations.

reportingViolations.content: If you notice content or behavior that violates this AUP, please report it immediately to our moderation team. We appreciate your help in keeping CrowdSolve a safe and productive space for everyone.

contact.header: If you have questions about this Acceptable Use Policy, please contact us at
